BoolProperty.Name: IdlGenCppGenerateIDL
BoolProperty.Description: Generate IDL for C++ headers. Default is true.

StringListProperty.Name: IdlGenCppInclude
StringListProperty.Description: Include C++ header files when generating idl. Override the default behavior where all C++ headers are included.

StringListProperty.Name: IdlGenCppExclude
StringListProperty.Description: Exclude C++ header files from generating idl. Override the default behavior where App.h and pch.h are excluded.

StringListProperty.Name: IdlGenCppGetterTemplate
StringListProperty.Description: Qualified names of templates with overloaded operator() which should be treated as getter when declared as non-statc data member

StringListProperty.Name: IdlGenCppPropertyTemplate
StringListProperty.Description: Qualified names of templates with overloaded operator() which should be treated as property when declared as non-statc data member

BoolProperty.Name: IdlGenCppDisableUnknownAttributeWarning
BoolProperty.Description: Disable unknown attribute warning caused by [[clang::annotate]]. Default is true.
